outputs.output_descr: Collecting data, conducting feasibility analysis, risk assessment, developing strategy, fine-tuning the activities and preparing budget for the full-size project both in UNDP format and in Global Environment Fund format. During project document preparation the need of the country in enhancing capacity of mitigating measures for CC will be analyzed, the opportunity to implement NAMAs will be investigated and necessary arrangement will be envisioned to make it possible.

project_descr: Nationally Appropriate Mitigation Actions (NAMAs) for low-carbon end-use sectors in Azerbaijan
